channel.title: Paradise Kiss on edelgrace.me
channel.description: Recent content in Paradise Kiss on edelgrace.me

item.title: Link Dump #2
item.description: I only have one link today, that’s the blog Altair & Vega. Altair & Vega is an extremely insightful blog that delves deep into the narrative and art of many popular anime and manga titles. They have a group of multiple authors and while their posts aren’t regular, when they do show up on my news feed, it’s a great treat. I forget how I originally got to this site. I probably stumbled upon it through the post on the anime Hyouka, “And You Don’t Doubt Your Own?
